info.name: Background color for image documents
info.description: Changes the background of image documents. Those are the pages that display just an image.
info.additionalInfo:
Image in the screenshot is by Kieran Meehan. (Because Gahan Wilson would surely sue.)
https://www.cartoonstock.com/directory/a/act_the_fool.asp

Background example is 'Seamless dino doodle bg!' by cuttlebutt
http://seamless-patterns.tumblr.com/page/4

More tiled backgrounds (because they're fun):
https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=tiled+backgrounds

options.label: tile (repeat the image to cover the tab)
contain (zoom until the image covers the tab in one direction; all of the image is visible)
cover (zoom until the tab is covered in both directions; some of the image won't show)
